The Aliante Hotel Malang merupakan hotel rekomendasi untuk Anda, seorang backpacker yang tak hanya mengutamakan bujet, tapi juga kenyamanan saat beristirahat setelah menempuh petualangan seharian penuh.
Bagi Anda yang menginginkan kualitas pelayanan oke dengan harga yang ramah di kantong, The Aliante Hotel Malang adalah pilihan yang tepat. Karena meski murah, akomodasi ini menyediakan fasilitas memadai dan pelayanan yang tetap terjaga mutunya.
Jika Anda memiliki agenda kegiatan yang membutuhkan ruangan besar, maka The Aliante Hotel Malang adalah pilihan yang tepat. Hotel ini memiliki ruang pertemuan yang luas dan dilengkapi dengan berbagai fasilitas penunjang.
The Aliante Hotel Malang adalah pilihan tepat bagi Anda yang ingin menghabiskan waktu dengan berbagai fasilitas mewah. Nikmati kualitas layanan terbaik dan pengalaman mengesankan selama menginap di hotel ini.
The Aliante Hotel Malang memiliki segala fasilitas penunjang bisnis untuk Anda dan kolega.
The Aliante Hotel Malang adalah tempat bermalam yang tepat bagi Anda yang berlibur bersama keluarga. Nikmati segala fasilitas hiburan untuk Anda dan keluarga.
Jika Anda berniat menginap dalam jangka waktu yang lama, The Aliante Hotel Malang adalah pilihan tepat. Berbagai fasilitas yang tersedia dan kualitas pelayanan yang baik akan membuat Anda merasa sedang berada di rumah sendiri.
Pengalaman menginap Anda tak akan terlupakan berkat pelayanan istimewa yang disertai oleh berbagai fasilitas pendukung untuk kenyamanan Anda.
Resepsionis siap 24 jam untuk melayani proses check-in, check-out dan kebutuhan Anda yang lain. Jangan ragu untuk menghubungi resepsionis, kami siap melayani Anda.
WiFi tersedia di seluruh area publik properti untuk membantu Anda tetap terhubung dengan keluarga dan teman.
Pengalaman berkesan dan tak terlupakan akan Anda dapatkan selama menginap di hotel The Aliante Hotel Malang.

hotelLists.description:
'Experience an unforgettable stay at Hotel Regent's Park Malang. Strategically located in the heart of Malang city, our hotel offers a comfortable ambiance and modern facilities to meet the needs of our guests.

Comfortable Accommodation
Hotel Regent's Park Malang offers a variety of spacious and elegant rooms, with modern designs and comprehensive amenities. Each room is equipped with a comfortable bed, flat-screen TV, complimentary Wi-Fi access, and a functional workspace, creating an ideal private space for relaxation and work.

Delicious Culinary Options
Indulge in delightful cuisine at our restaurant, serving local and international dishes. Guests can enjoy delicious meals with authentic flavors, prepared with fresh ingredients and crafted by the skillful hands of our chefs. From a delightful breakfast to a romantic dinner, we provide an unforgettable culinary experience.

Professional Meeting Facilities
Hotel Regent's Park Malang is also an ideal choice for business meetings and social events. We offer spacious meeting rooms equipped with modern audiovisual equipment, along with a professional team ready to assist in organizing your event seamlessly. From business meetings to wedding celebrations, we will arrange every detail to ensure the success of your event.

Recreation and Relaxation
Guests can unwind and enjoy our recreational facilities, including a refreshing swimming pool and a modern fitness center. If you desire a rejuvenating massage, our spa services are available to provide a calming and refreshing experience for your body and mind.

Strategic Location
Located in the heart of Malang city, Hotel Regent's Park Malang provides easy access to various tourist attractions, shopping venues, and business centers. With its strategic location, our guests can explore the natural beauty of Malang, visit historical sites, or enjoy the vibrant nightlife.

Comfort and Hospitality
We take pride in delivering friendly and professional service to every guest. Our experienced staff is ready to assist with all your needs, ensuring that your visit to Hotel Regent's Park Malang is an unforgettable experience.

hotelLists.description:
Hotel Tugu Malang, part of Tugu Hotels, Resorts & Restaurants Indonesia, is located right at the heart of the old city centre, facing “Jan Pieterszoon Coen Plein“ the main old town square which after the independence era of Indonesia, around 1946, became one of the first independence memorial monuments that were built in Indonesia, now complimented with a huge lotus pond. A destination on its own, Hotel Tugu Malang is the most essential way in experiencing the beautiful richness of the history of Java, with a lot of open spaces, offering 49 beautiful guest rooms equipped with modern amenities. All rooms have access to fresh air circulation afforded by wide windows in each room, where our guests are able to enjoy the cool breeze of Malang City.

Enjoy   the   101   dining   experiences available at the famous Melati Restaurant & SaigonSan Restaurant and Rofftop Terrace. At Tugu Malang, every meal transports guests back to different periods of Indonesia.  Every dining room features not only different food concepts, but themes, rituals of service   and atmospheres which   are unique from one   another.   
Melati Restaurant is famous for its original Indonesian homecooking recipes, authentic Chinese Peranakan menu, as well as a vast menu of tender, juicy steaks, ranging from old Dutch Colonial recipes of batter-fried steaks to gourmet French-style grilled wagyu steaks. 

SaigonSan serves classical & innovative modern Thai & Vietnamese cuisine, with SaigonSan rated as the #1 restaurant out of 635 restaurants in Malang according to leading review site at TripAdvisor.

Hotel Tugu Malang also has been named Top 20 Best Hotels in Asia by Conde Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards 2019, as one of only two hotels from Indonesia listed in the category. The awards signify the essence of Hotel Tugu Malang – leading Indonesian luxury hospitality presented through unique services and cultural experiences, with a mission to bring back to life the beautiful art, culture, and history of Indonesia to world. Staying at Tugu Malang is a cultural journey that cannot be replicated in any other hotel.

hotelLists.name: Hotel Tugu Malang

Gets Hotel Malang menghadirkan kamar modern, kolam renang outdoor, fasilitas kebugaran dan restoran hotel. Berlokasi kurang dari 5 menit berkendara dari Alun-alun Tugu Malang, hotel ini juga menyediakan parkir gratis dan WiFi gratis di area hotel.


Kamar ber-AC dengan desain menawan di hotel ini dilengkapi dengan TV layar datar, minibar dan area tempat duduk. Para tamu juga disediakan dengan air mineral dan fasilitas pembuat kopi/teh. Kamar mandi dilengkapi dengan shower, handuk dan peralatan mandi gratis.


Fenix Restaurant menawarkan masakan Indonesia dan internasional untuk para tamu restoran, atau pesan melalui layanan kamar. Sarapan buffet juga tersedia serta bar kopi di tepi kolam. Restoran lokal dapat dicapai dengan 5 menit berjalan kaki, seperti Soto Ayam Lamongan Mitra dengan nuansa otentik Jawa dan Wood Eatery yang khusus menyajikan masakan Indonesia seperti gado-gado dan nasi goreng. 


Para tamu dapat bersantai di tepi kolam sedangkan anak-anak bermain di kolam anak. Layanan kebersihan harian dan layanan laundry juga tersedia. Resepsionis 24 jam dapat membantu para tamu dengan penyimpanan bagasi dan parkir valet. Hotel ini juga menawarkan ruang rapat untuk kegiatan bisnis maupun pribadi. 


Gets Hotel Malang terletak kurang dari 3 menit berkendara dari Alun-alun Tugu Malang dan Brawijaya Edupark, sedangkan taman bermain keluarga yang terkenal yaitu Jatim Park berjarak 18 km dari hotel ini. Hotel ini berjarak 15 km dari Bandara Internasional Abdul Rahman Saleh dan 5 km dari stasiun kereta api Kota Lama.

A 5-minute drive from Malang Town Square, the Everyday Smart Hotel-Malang is a 40-minute drive from both Batu Secret Zoo and Abdul Rachman Saleh Airport.

The air-conditioned rooms are simply fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, an electric kettle and towels. They all have a private bathroom with hot shower facilities and free toiletries.

Newspapers can be found in the lobby area. The staff can assist with laundry requests for a fee.

Every morning, breakfast is served in the hotel's dining area. Dining options are available within a 5-minute drive away.

hotelLists.description:
The Grand Palace Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Malang City Square, a 15-minute drive from Mall Olympic Garden and a 30-minute drive Malang Town Square Mall. Abdul Rahman Saleh Airport is a 25-minute drive away while Batu area is a 40-minute ride from the hotel.

Rooms each have garden views, with select rooms offering a balcony. Each is fitted with a minibar, tea/coffee-making facilities and a satellite TV. Free toiletries are included.

Car rental and sightseeing arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Airport shuttle is provided at a cost.

A selection of Western, Chinese and Indonesian dishes are served in The Continental Restaurant. Drinks are served in the bar.
